item.description:
Well, the weather likes to screw me over again.  When I want to host an outdoor event, it rains.  When I want to host an indoor event, it becomes sunny and hot... :-)

Due to the awesome weather forecasted for this Sunday, I've decided to supplement my day plans:

If anybody wants to play games on Sunday, but rather spend the day enjoying the weather and eating ice cream during daylight first, I will open up my place for an open house gaming event starting at 6pm.  That way you can have your ice cream and eat it too since Monday is a holiday and I have no problem playing into the night.

No theme, we can play whatever.  I have my collection of board games, some new dice games as well as my Wii.  So utilize my games or bring your own.  And probably a good idea to bring a snack or drink to share as I will have limited stuff.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Last minute open house
